WorkItem.Description: Without changing gear, each time I view the graphs to valuate a slot of gear or look at gems, the values are changing.  In the case of gems, some of them will have a very severe negative value usually in Threat.
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Gear & Gem values constantly in flux

Comments.Message: This suggests there is either a variable somewhere in the model that is getting re-used without being properly initialized, or a problem with thread safety (generally caused by models using static methods and members).

Revision: 35031
Author: SND\Shazear_cp
Date: 3:23:17 PM, Monday, June 29, 2009
Message:
TankDK:
Fix for def: 13541 - Gear & Gem values constantly in flux. Significantly reduced window for multi-threaded problems.  There's still the occasional glitch, but much better than it was.

Fix for def: 13530 - Optimizer glitches from Expertise.  the real probablems were w/ the multi-threaded safety and that's gone now.

Pseudo-Fix for def 13528 - Values suddenly changed.  Values are still changing, but should be more reasonable now.
